This is a chronologic list of representative anthropologically-minded films and filmmakers:
Part of a series on the
Anthropology of art,
media, music, dance
and film
Basic concepts
  • Color symbolism
  • Visual culture
  • Body culture
  • Material culture
  • New media
Case studies
Art
  • Art of the Americas
  • Indigenous Australian art
  • Oceanic art

  • Nanook of the North
  • The Ax Fight
  • Nǃai, the Story of a ǃKung Woman
  • Incidents of Travel in Chichen Itza
